div.div: Lycoming College vs. Delaware Valley Coll
at Doylestown, PA | James Work Memorial

tr.td: DVC wins the toss and defers the toss. Lycoming to receive
Tom Worthington kickoff 53 yards to the LYCOTR12, Parker Showers return 25 yards to the LYCOTR37 (Max Stella).
Parker Showers rush for 10 yards to the LYCOTR47, 1ST DOWN LYCOTR (John Robinson).
Parker Showers rush for 4 yards to the DVC49, fumble forced by John Eberly, fumble by Parker Showers recovered by DVC John Eberly at DVC49.

Kyle Schuberth rush for 4 yards to the LYCOTR47 (Tyler Denike).
